name: Zhen
description:
Zhen is a Tower Defense Game with Top-Down RPG Elements.

This vertical was produced over a period of 48 hours for the Score Space Game Jam.

This Game could not have been produced without the help of a special group of Hackers. Specifically:

Modbom for his incredible work on Audio Design, Music Production, SFX production, Game Design, Graphic Production (see cover photo), and of course Quality Assurance
https://soundcloud.com/mod_bom

Plus the help of the following artists from FreeSound.org
Coin sound - projectsu012
Gong sound - GowlerMusic
windChimes - inspectorJ
Everything else sound-wise - modbom

With many texture assets provided for free by Textures.com. And some fine handywork done using Paint.NET

Modelling / Rigging / Animation done in Blender 2.8, the free and open source 3D software package.

Engine Tools: Unity 2018.4 LTS, Visual Studio 2019

Asset packs used:

  • Boxophic: Skybox Extended
  • BecomeALittleGirl: Fast Mobile Bloom
  • Unity Technologies: Gem Shader
  • Mystery Corgi: Hana Pixel Font
  • Unity Technologies: NavMeshComponents
  • Mikael Gustafsson: Stylized Nature Pack

All other Modeling, Rigging, Animation, & Scripting was done in house!

Big thanks to everyone who helped test and debug. Thank you Chrimbus, Aleta, Darexi, and my mom. And a special thanks to itch.io for always keeping the door open for indie developers and enabling free build hosting and store front services!
